title: Sir Suffix
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 126 words, Level F (Grade 1), Lexile 330L, Fiction Series
description: Who is Sir Suffix, and what can he do? Sir Suffix ends words in new ways! In Sir Suffix, students will explore the usefulness of a variety of suffixes, including -ive, -ful, -less, and more! Colorful illustrations and engaging text make this book a perfect choice for teaching about suffixes. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing as well as the proper use of adjectives in sentences.
